attributes.action: Provide a Right to reply to petition responses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have often noted that the responses to petitions, as provided on this website, fail to address the issues raised by the petitions.  

Could we please have the ability to add comments on this website following the published reply.  This would enable us to highlight any perceived failure to address in full the original petitioners' point(s).

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
